class.name: DotnetNugetPushStep
class.description: A [dotnet nuget push step](https://github.com/JetBrains/teamcity-dotnet-plugin) to run .NET CLI command

function.name: dotnetNugetPush
function.description: Adds a [dotnet nuget push step](https://github.com/JetBrains/teamcity-dotnet-plugin) to run .NET CLI command @see DotnetNugetPushStep

param.name: paths
param.description: Specify paths to nuget packages. Wildcards are supported.

param.name: nuget.packageSource
param.description: Specify the server URL. To use a TeamCity NuGet feed, specify the URL from the NuGet feed project settings page.

param.name: secure:nuget.apiKey
param.description: Specify the API key to access the NuGet packages feed. For the built-in TeamCity NuGet server use %teamcity.nuget.feed.api.key%.

param.name: nuget.noSymbols
param.description: Do not publish nuget symbol packages

param.name: args
param.description: Enter additional command line parameters for dotnet nuget push.

param.name: required.sdk
param.description: .NET SDK versions separated by semicolon to be required on agents.
